attributes.description:
PICANTO 1.0 MT START PE
Stunning Picanto Start in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Manual transmission and gives a smooth, reliable drive to all your destinations. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this classic for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

Estimated monthly payment is R 3 170.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 17 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Picanto 1.0 Start

attributes.description:
2022 Kia Picanto 1.0 Street Automatic  (face lift)
Excellent fuel saver, easy to drive, perfect 1st car. Vehicle has a complete android auto, Apple CarPlay infotainment system.
Reverse camera, multi-function steering controls with trip monitor. Front and rear electric windows, A/C, USB, aux etc.
Balance of service plan, 5 year unlimited mileage warranty.  Trade Ins welcome, Finance can be arranged with all major banks by our finance team.
All vehicles go through our 125 point check, and dekra roadworthy ensuring peace of mind motoring. 
Enquire now for assistance.

attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full-service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
5 Year / 150 000 Km Warranty & 5 Year / 60 000 Km Service Plan. 1 Million Km Or 10 Year Engine Warranty!

Features:
6 Airbags,
Dual front Airbags,
Front Side Airbags,
Curtain Airbags, 
ISOFIX,
ABS+EBD(Electronic Brakeforce Distribution) 
Emergency Brake Assist,
ESP(Electronic Stability Program),
TCS (Traction Control System),
RSC (Roll Stability Control),
EPB+Autohold,
Hill Assist & Downhill Assist, 
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) 
Rear view camera,
Rear view camera (with dynamic guides),
Keyless Entry and Push Button Start,
Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirror, 
Blind Spot Detection,
Front collision warning,
Driver seatbelt pre-tensioner,
ABS,
Rear Cross Traffic Alert,
Intelligent High beam control,
Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering, 
Multi-function Steering Wheel with 4-way Adjustments, 
Electronic Parking Brake (EPB),
Roof Rails,
Automatic Headlights, 
Halogen Headlights,
LED Daytime Running Lights,
Automatic Headlights,
Halogen Headlights,
Leather Seats,
60:40 Split Folding Rear Seats,
10.25-inch Multimedia Touch Display,
3.5-inch colour TFT Cluster,
Intelligent Voice Control,
Apple CarPlay/Android Auto,

Pop your Chery in the new ALL-NEW Tiggo 4 Pro with Intelligent Voice Assistance, Intelligent Climate Control, and a host of other cutting-edge features. The SUV that commands attention everywhere you go! This new Chery in Elite specification will leave you speechless with its excellent fuel efficiency, class-leading interior build, and jaw-dropping Warranty!

Nationwide delivery,
T&C's apply
